all_settings.title: Stats Logger
all_settings.description: Statistics logger instance for metrics collection. Default: `DummyStatsLogger()`

all_settings.title: Event Logger
all_settings.description: Event logger instance for audit trails. Default: `DBEventLogger()`

all_settings.title: Superset Log View
all_settings.description: Enable access to log files through the UI. **Disable in production** for security.

all_settings.title: Superset Security View Menu
all_settings.description: Enable security view menu in the UI. Shows roles and permissions management.

all_settings.title: Base Dir
all_settings.description: Base directory path for Superset installation. Auto-detected from package location.

all_settings.title: Version Info File
all_settings.description: Path to version information JSON file. Contains build metadata.

all_settings.title: Package Json File
all_settings.description: Path to package.json file for frontend build information.

all_settings.title: Favicons
all_settings.description: List of favicon configurations. Each favicon should specify `href` (required) and optionally `sizes`, `type`, and `rel` properties.

all_settings.title: Alembic Skip Log Config
all_settings.description: Skip Alembic log configuration. Set to `True` if you configure logging elsewhere.

all_settings.title: Version String
all_settings.description: Version string displayed in the UI. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE` or set manually.

all_settings.title: Version Sha Length
all_settings.description: Length of git SHA displayed in version info. Default: 8 characters.

all_settings.title: Version Sha
all_settings.description: Git SHA of current build. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE`.

all_settings.title: Build Number
all_settings.description: Build number displayed in About section. Set during CI/CD build process.

all_settings.title: Default Viz Type
all_settings.description: Default visualization type in chart explorer. Options: `"table"`, `"bar"`, `"line"`, `"pie"`, etc.

all_settings.title: Row Limit
all_settings.description: Default maximum number of rows returned by chart queries. Prevents excessive data transfer and memory usage.

all_settings.title: Samples Row Limit
all_settings.description: Maximum number of rows for data sampling.

all_settings.title: Native Filter Default Row Limit
all_settings.description: Default maximum number of rows returned by native filters for performance.

all_settings.title: Filter Select Row Limit
all_settings.description: Maximum number of rows retrieved by filter dropdown auto-complete.

all_settings.title: Default Time Filter
all_settings.description: Default time filter for charts. Use `NO_TIME_RANGE` constant or specific time ranges.

all_settings.title: Superset Webserver Timeout
all_settings.description: Request timeout in seconds for the Superset web server. Increase for slow-running queries.

all_settings.title: Superset Dashboard Periodical Refresh Limit
all_settings.description: Minimum interval (in seconds) between dashboard auto-refreshes. Set to `0` to disable limit.

all_settings.title: Superset Dashboard Periodical Refresh Warning Message
all_settings.description: Warning message displayed when dashboard refresh is rate-limited.

all_settings.title: Superset Dashboard Position Data Limit
all_settings.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of dashboard layout data. Prevents oversized layouts.

all_settings.title: Custom Security Manager
all_settings.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Custom security manager class. Override Flask-AppBuilder default security. Must inherit from `SupersetSecurityManager`.

all_settings.title: Sqlalchemy Track Modifications
all_settings.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Track object modifications. Keep `False` for better performance.

all_settings.title: Secret Key
all_settings.description: Your application secret key. **Must be overridden** in production via `superset_config.py` or `SUPERSET_SECRET_KEY` environment variable. Use a **strong complex alphanumeric string**. Generate with: `openssl rand -base64 42`

all_settings.title: Sqlalchemy Database Uri
all_settings.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Database connection string. Examples: `postgresql://user:pass@localhost/superset`, `mysql://user:pass@localhost/superset`

all_settings.title: Sqlalchemy Engine Options
all_settings.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Dictionary of engine options passed to SQLAlchemy. Use for database-specific settings like isolation level: `{"isolation_level": "READ COMMITTED"}`. We **recommend READ COMMITTED** for production.

all_settings.title: Sqlalchemy Custom Password Store
all_settings.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom password store function for database connections. Implement a function that takes a `sqlalchemy.engine.url` and returns a password. Example: `def lookup_password(url): return "secret"`

all_settings.title: Sqlalchemy Encrypted Field Type Adapter
all_settings.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom encrypted field type adapter for sensitive data. Uses app `SECRET_KEY` for encryption by default.

all_settings.title: Query Search Limit
all_settings.description: Maximum number of queries returned in SQL Lab query search.

all_settings.title: Wtf Csrf Enabled
all_settings.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable CSRF protection for forms. **Recommended to keep `True`** in production for security.

all_settings.title: Wtf Csrf Exempt List
all_settings.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: List of endpoints exempt from CSRF protection. Use with caution.

all_settings.title: Debug
all_settings.description: Enable Flask debug mode. **Never enable in production**. Use environment variable: `SUPERSET_DEBUG=True`

all_settings.title: Flask Use Reload
all_settings.description: Enable Flask auto-reload on code changes. **Only for development**.

all_settings.title: Profiling
all_settings.description: Enable Flask profiling. **Only for development**. Adds performance overhead.

all_settings.title: Show Stacktrace
all_settings.description: Show full stack traces in error pages. **Disable in production** for security.

all_settings.title: Enable Proxy Fix
all_settings.description: Enable proxy fix for applications behind reverse proxies. Required for proper URL generation.

all_settings.title: Proxy Fix Config
all_settings.description: Configuration for proxy fix settings. Specifies which proxy headers to trust.

all_settings.title: Ratelimit Enabled
all_settings.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting to prevent DDOS attacks. Uses `RATELIMIT_STORAGE_URI` for storage backend. **Recommended for production**.

all_settings.title: Ratelimit Application
all_settings.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Global rate limit for the entire application. Format: `"50 per second"`, `"100 per minute"`, etc.

all_settings.title: Auth Rate Limited
all_settings.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting for authentication endpoints. Helps prevent brute force attacks.

all_settings.title: Auth Rate Limit
all_settings.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Rate limit for authentication attempts. Format: `"5 per second"`, `"10 per minute"`, etc.

all_settings.title: App Name
all_settings.description: Application name displayed in the UI header and browser title. Default: `"Superset"`

all_settings.title: App Icon
all_settings.description: Path to application logo/icon displayed in the UI. Default: `"/static/assets/images/superset-logo-horiz.png"`

all_settings.title: Logo Target Path
all_settings.description: URL or path where the logo click should redirect. Leave `None` to disable logo clicking.

all_settings.title: Logo Tooltip
all_settings.description: Tooltip text shown when hovering over the logo. Leave empty for no tooltip.

all_settings.title: Fab Api Swagger Ui
all_settings.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Swagger UI for API documentation. Accessible at `/swagger/v1`

all_settings.title: Auth Type
all_settings.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Authentication type. Options: `AUTH_DB`, `AUTH_OAUTH`, `AUTH_REMOTE_USER`, `AUTH_LDAP`.

all_settings.title: Babel Default Locale
all_settings.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Default locale for internationalization. Set to language code like `"en"`, `"es"`, `"fr"`, etc.

all_settings.title: Babel Default Folder
all_settings.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Directory containing translation files. Default: `"superset/translations"`

all_settings.title: Languages
all_settings.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Dictionary of supported languages. Keys are language codes, values are display names.

all_settings.title: Currencies
all_settings.description: List of supported currency codes for financial data formatting.

all_settings.title: Ssh Tunnel Manager Class
all_settings.description: SSH tunnel manager class for secure database connections through SSH.

all_settings.title: Ssh Tunnel Local Bind Address
all_settings.description: Local bind address for SSH tunnels. Default: `"127.0.0.1"`

all_settings.title: Ssh Tunnel Timeout Sec
all_settings.description: Timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel connections.

all_settings.title: Ssh Tunnel Packet Timeout Sec
all_settings.description: Packet timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel data transfer.

all_settings.title: Cache Warmup Executors
all_settings.description: List of executor types for cache warmup. Options: `ExecutorType.SELENIUM`, `ExecutorType.OWNER`, etc.

all_settings.title: Thumbnail Executors
all_settings.description: List of executor types for thumbnail generation.

all_settings.title: Thumbnail Error Cache Ttl
all_settings.description: Cache timeout in seconds for thumbnail generation errors.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Locate Wait
all_settings.description: Wait time in seconds for elements to be located during screenshot capture.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Load Wait
all_settings.description: Wait time in seconds for page to load during screenshot capture.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Selenium Retries
all_settings.description: Number of retries for Selenium screenshot capture.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Selenium Headstart
all_settings.description: Head start time in seconds for Selenium screenshot capture.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Selenium Animation Wait
all_settings.description: Wait time in seconds for animations to complete during screenshot capture.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Replace Unexpected Errors
all_settings.description: Whether to replace unexpected errors with generic messages in screenshots.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Wait For Error Modal Visible
all_settings.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become visible.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Wait For Error Modal Invisible
all_settings.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become invisible.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Playwright Wait Event
all_settings.description: Playwright wait event for page loading. Options: `"domcontentloaded"`, `"load"`, `"networkidle"`.

all_settings.title: Screenshot Playwright Default Timeout
all_settings.description: Default timeout in seconds for Playwright operations.

all_settings.title: Upload Folder
all_settings.description: Directory for temporary file uploads. Should be writable by the Superset process.

all_settings.title: Upload Chunk Size
all_settings.description: Chunk size in bytes for file uploads. Affects memory usage during uploads.

all_settings.title: Cache Default Timeout
all_settings.description: Default cache timeout in seconds. Applies to all cache backends unless specifically overridden.

all_settings.title: Store Cache Keys In Metadata Db
all_settings.description: Whether to store cache keys in the metadata database. Enables cache key tracking but may impact performance.

all_settings.title: Enable Cors
all_settings.description: **[Cross-Origin Resource Sharing](https://flask-cors.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. Set to `True` if your frontend is served from a different domain. Requires: `pip install flask-cors`

all_settings.title: Html Sanitization
all_settings.description: Enable HTML sanitization for user inputs. **Keep enabled** for security.

all_settings.title: Superset Webserver Domains
all_settings.description: List of allowed domains for the webserver. Used for security validation.

all_settings.title: Excel Extensions
all_settings.description: Set of allowed Excel file extensions for uploads.

all_settings.title: Csv Extensions
all_settings.description: Set of allowed CSV file extensions for uploads.

all_settings.title: Columnar Extensions
all_settings.description: Set of allowed columnar file extensions (Parquet, etc.) for uploads.

all_settings.title: Allowed Extensions
all_settings.description: Combined set of all allowed file extensions for uploads.

all_settings.title: Csv Export
all_settings.description: Configuration for CSV export functionality including encoding settings.

all_settings.title: Default Module Ds Map
all_settings.description: Default module-to-datasource mapping for backwards compatibility.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Save Warning Message
all_settings.description: Warning message shown when saving queries in SQL Lab.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Schedule Warning Message
all_settings.description: Warning message shown when scheduling queries in SQL Lab.

all_settings.title: Celery Beat Scheduler Expires
all_settings.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Expiration time for scheduled tasks. Used for alerts & reports scheduler timing.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Timeout
all_settings.description: Timeout in seconds for synchronous SQL Lab queries.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Validation Timeout
all_settings.description: Timeout in seconds for SQL validation in SQL Lab.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Default Dbid
all_settings.description: Default database ID for SQL Lab.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Async Time Limit Sec
all_settings.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Maximum duration (in seconds) a SQL query can run before being killed by Celery worker.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Query Cost Estimate Timeout
all_settings.description: Timeout in seconds for query cost estimation.

all_settings.title: Sqllab Ctas No Limit
all_settings.description: Disable row limit for CREATE TABLE AS SELECT operations in SQL Lab.

all_settings.title: Results Backend Use Msgpack
all_settings.description: Use MessagePack for results backend serialization.

all_settings.title: Csv To Hive Upload S3 Bucket
Flask App Mutator
all_settings.description: Callable function to mutate Flask app at startup. Receives Flask app instance as parameter.

all_settings.title: Silence Fab
all_settings.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Whether to bump logging level to ERROR on flask_appbuilder package. Set to `False` for debugging AppBuilder issues.

all_settings.title: Fab Add Security View Menu View
Fab Add Security Permission Views View
Db Connection Mutator
all_settings.description: Function to mutate database connection parameters. Useful for dynamic authentication.

all_settings.title: Machine Auth Provider Class
all_settings.description: Machine authentication provider class for programmatic access.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Working Time Out Kill
all_settings.description: Kill alerts/reports that exceed working timeout.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Working Time Out Lag
all_settings.description: Lag time in seconds before killing long-running alerts/reports.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Working Soft Time Out Lag
all_settings.description: Soft timeout lag in seconds for alerts/reports.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Notification Dry Run
all_settings.description: Dry run mode for alert/report notifications. Useful for testing.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Query Execution Max Tries
all_settings.description: Maximum number of tries for alert/report query execution.

all_settings.title: Alert Reports Min Custom Screenshot Width
Alert Reports Max Custom Screenshot Width
Webdriver Window
all_settings.description: Window configuration for webdriver operations.

all_settings.title: Webdriver Option Args
all_settings.description: Command-line arguments for webdriver (Chrome/Firefox).

all_settings.title: Webdriver Baseurl
all_settings.description: Base URL for webdriver operations. Used for screenshot and export functionality.

all_settings.title: Webdriver Baseurl User Friendly
all_settings.description: User-friendly base URL for webdriver operations.

all_settings.title: Prevent Unsafe Default Urls On Dataset
all_settings.description: Prevent potentially unsafe default URLs on datasets. **Security feature**.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Redis Stream Prefix
all_settings.description: Redis stream prefix for global async queries.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Redis Stream Limit
all_settings.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Redis Stream Limit Firehose
all_settings.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries firehose.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Register Request Handlers
Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Name
all_settings.description: JWT cookie name for global async queries.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Secure
all_settings.description: Secure flag for global async queries JWT cookie.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Domain
all_settings.description: Domain for global async queries JWT cookie.

all_settings.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Secret
all_settings.description: JWT secret for global async queries.

all_settings.title: Guest Role Name
all_settings.description: Name of the guest role for anonymous access.

all_settings.title: Guest Token Jwt Secret
all_settings.description: JWT secret for guest token generation.

all_settings.title: Guest Token Jwt Algo
all_settings.description: JWT algorithm for guest token generation.

all_settings.title: Guest Token Header Name
all_settings.description: Header name for guest token authentication.

all_settings.title: Guest Token Jwt Exp Seconds
all_settings.description: Expiration time in seconds for guest tokens.

logging.title: Alembic Skip Log Config
logging.description: Skip Alembic log configuration. Set to `True` if you configure logging elsewhere.

logging.title: Debug
logging.description: Enable Flask debug mode. **Never enable in production**. Use environment variable: `SUPERSET_DEBUG=True`

logging.title: Event Logger
logging.description: Event logger instance for audit trails. Default: `DBEventLogger()`

logging.title: Logo Target Path
logging.description: URL or path where the logo click should redirect. Leave `None` to disable logo clicking.

logging.description: Tooltip text shown when hovering over the logo. Leave empty for no tooltip.

logging.title: Stats Logger
logging.description: Statistics logger instance for metrics collection. Default: `DummyStatsLogger()`

logging.title: Superset Log View
logging.description: Enable access to log files through the UI. **Disable in production** for security.

security.title: Custom Security Manager
security.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Custom security manager class. Override Flask-AppBuilder default security. Must inherit from `SupersetSecurityManager`.

security.description: Enable security view menu in the UI. Shows roles and permissions management.

performance.title: Ratelimit Enabled
performance.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting to prevent DDOS attacks. Uses `RATELIMIT_STORAGE_URI` for storage backend. **Recommended for production**.

performance.title: Row Limit
performance.description: Default maximum number of rows returned by chart queries. Prevents excessive data transfer and memory usage.

performance.title: Samples Row Limit
performance.description: Maximum number of rows for data sampling.

performance.title: Screenshot Playwright Default Timeout
performance.description: Default timeout in seconds for Playwright operations.

performance.title: Sqllab Async Time Limit Sec
performance.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Maximum duration (in seconds) a SQL query can run before being killed by Celery worker.

performance.title: Sqllab Ctas No Limit
performance.description: Disable row limit for CREATE TABLE AS SELECT operations in SQL Lab.

performance.title: Sqllab Query Cost Estimate Timeout
performance.description: Timeout in seconds for query cost estimation.

performance.title: Sqllab Timeout
performance.description: Timeout in seconds for synchronous SQL Lab queries.

performance.title: Sqllab Validation Timeout
performance.description: Timeout in seconds for SQL validation in SQL Lab.

performance.title: Ssh Tunnel Packet Timeout Sec
performance.description: Packet timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel data transfer.

performance.title: Ssh Tunnel Timeout Sec
performance.description: Timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel connections.

performance.title: Store Cache Keys In Metadata Db
performance.description: Whether to store cache keys in the metadata database. Enables cache key tracking but may impact performance.

performance.title: Superset Dashboard Periodical Refresh Limit
performance.description: Minimum interval (in seconds) between dashboard auto-refreshes. Set to `0` to disable limit.

performance.title: Superset Dashboard Position Data Limit
performance.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of dashboard layout data. Prevents oversized layouts.

performance.title: Superset Webserver Timeout
performance.description: Request timeout in seconds for the Superset web server. Increase for slow-running queries.

performance.title: Thumbnail Error Cache Ttl
performance.description: Cache timeout in seconds for thumbnail generation errors.

database.title: Alert Reports Query Execution Max Tries
database.description: Maximum number of tries for alert/report query execution.

database.title: Db Connection Mutator
database.description: Function to mutate database connection parameters. Useful for dynamic authentication.

database.title: Sqlalchemy Custom Password Store
database.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom password store function for database connections. Implement a function that takes a `sqlalchemy.engine.url` and returns a password. Example: `def lookup_password(url): return "secret"`

database.title: Sqlalchemy Database Uri
database.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Database connection string. Examples: `postgresql://user:pass@localhost/superset`, `mysql://user:pass@localhost/superset`

database.title: Sqlalchemy Encrypted Field Type Adapter
database.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom encrypted field type adapter for sensitive data. Uses app `SECRET_KEY` for encryption by default.

database.title: Sqlalchemy Engine Options
database.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Dictionary of engine options passed to SQLAlchemy. Use for database-specific settings like isolation level: `{"isolation_level": "READ COMMITTED"}`. We **recommend READ COMMITTED** for production.

database.title: Sqlalchemy Track Modifications
database.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Track object modifications. Keep `False` for better performance.

database.title: Sqllab Default Dbid
database.description: Default database ID for SQL Lab.

database.title: Sqllab Save Warning Message
database.description: Warning message shown when saving queries in SQL Lab.

database.title: Sqllab Schedule Warning Message
database.description: Warning message shown when scheduling queries in SQL Lab.

features.title: Enable Cors
features.description: **[Cross-Origin Resource Sharing](https://flask-cors.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. Set to `True` if your frontend is served from a different domain. Requires: `pip install flask-cors`

features.title: Enable Proxy Fix
features.description: Enable proxy fix for applications behind reverse proxies. Required for proper URL generation.

features.title: Wtf Csrf Enabled
features.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable CSRF protection for forms. **Recommended to keep `True`** in production for security.

async.title: Celery Beat Scheduler Expires
async.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Expiration time for scheduled tasks. Used for alerts & reports scheduler timing.

async.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Domain
async.description: Domain for global async queries JWT cookie.

async.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Name
async.description: JWT cookie name for global async queries.

async.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Cookie Secure
async.description: Secure flag for global async queries JWT cookie.

async.title: Global Async Queries Jwt Secret
async.description: JWT secret for global async queries.

async.title: Global Async Queries Redis Stream Prefix
async.description: Redis stream prefix for global async queries.

async.title: Global Async Queries Register Request Handlers
